submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        
        n = len(nums)
        dp = [[0 for i in range(max(nums) + 1)] for j in range(n)]
        
        for k in range(nums[0] + 1) :
            dp[0][k] = dp[0][k - 1]
            dp[0][k] += 1
            
        for i in range(1, n) :
            
            for a in range(nums[i] + 1) :
                prev_a = a
                nums[i - 1] - prev_a >= (nums[i] - a)
                prev_a <= (a - nums[i]) + nums[i - 1]
                prev_a = min(a, (a - nums[i] + nums[i - 1]))

                dp[i][a] = dp[i][a - 1]
                dp[i][a] += dp[i - 1][prev_a]
                dp[i][a] %= 1000000007
        
        last = nums[-1]
        return dp[n - 1][last] % 1000000007
